name: TinyPlanets
description:
A space strategy game set in many small planets

After the invention of the SuperSpeed FTL travel drive most big enterprises deciced to invest on it. You are no exception. A group of pioneers are sent to the system "Kepler 52B" with hopes of bringing wealth to your corporation. Will you suceed or will you be defeated by the other groups?

There is an ingame guide which should introduce you to the game. If you are confused feel free to ask in the comments

If you suddenly get annihilated, it means you had too little soldiers. Make sure you always have a decent ammount!

Known Issues:

- AI is wonky (slow sometimes, very fast other times)

- Attacks sometimes are fairly buggy (Ran out of time...)

I plan on making updates to this post-jam!

(If there is any super-huge, trivial bug I will fix it in the jam version, so please report any game-breaking problems you encounter!)

(Made for LudumDare 38, this version probably contains many bugs!)
